nodes.text: Reya was as a male Neimoidian baron of Cato Neimoidia in the decades following the Battle of Endor. A member of House Reya, he attempted to do business with Leia Organa, the leader of the Resistance. However, this was in reality a ploy on the Resistance's part in order to free Lor San Tekka, who had been captured in Baron Paw Maccon's vault.
